content: the last two stitches on the left needle this joins in the round k the 2 sets of stitches together as the last 2 stitches you will wind up with 24 stitches on three needles 8 8 8 which are joined in the round round 1 k5 m-kfb k11 kfb k6 26 stitches round 2 k6 m-kfb k12 kfb k6 28 stitches round 3 k round 4 k6 m-kfb k13 kfb k7 30 stitches round 5 k round 6 k6 m-kfb k14 kfb k8 32 stitches round 7 k cast off purlwise with size 3 needle weave in ends sew on snap at neck if desired © 2025 dawn smith
